case_title: Mst. AISHA and another vs Mrs. SAMAR AFROZE

key_points.default_reason: Failure to tender rent to new landlord after notice

rent_cases.details: Rent deposited in name of previous owner until February 1997
Rent deposited in joint names of previous owner and respondent

key_points.court_findings: Deposit of rent in joint names not valid tender to new landlord
key_points.tenant_action: Wilful default in payment of rent

judgment_excerpts: Tenant required to pay rent within 30 days to new landlord after notice under Section 18.
Deposit of rent in joint names of previous owner and respondent not valid tender.
No illegality or irregularity found in orders of two Courts below.
